bike.description: M5 manipulated alloy frame w/ women's XC Trail geometry, ORE TT/DT, tapered HT, DMD front derailleur, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, replaceable derailleur hanger, disc only, 120mm travel

1-1/8 and 1.5" Threadless, Campy style upper with 1.5" lower, cartridge bearings
Specialized XC, 3D forged alloy, 4-bolt, 31.8mm clamp, adjustable rise

Specialized XC lock-on

Custom Avid Elixir R CR SL hydraulic, tool-less reach and pad contact adj., alloy lever blade
